body_html:
Warning: the constructor initialization problem is transitive. So the following program won't work:

#include "optional.h"

struct O {
  O() : x() {}
  at::optional<int> x;
};

struct U {
  U() {}
  O o;
};

void blah() {
  U u;
}

You need to explicit initialize o, or you will get this error as well.
